text: pūrvvavēdakkār bhinniccat avarkk aṟiv vannukiṭṭiyatin śēṣaṁ tanneyāṇ‌. avar tam'miluḷḷa virēādhaṁ nimittamāṇat‌. nirṇitamāya oru avadhivarēkk bādhakamāya oru vacanaṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninn mump tanne uṇṭāyiṭṭillāyirunnuveṅkil avarkkiṭayil (uṭane) tīrppukalpikkappeṭumāyirunnu. avarkk śēṣaṁ vēdagranthattinṟe anantarāvakāśaṁ nalkappeṭṭavar tīrccayāyuṁ atineppaṟṟi aviśvāsajanakamāya sanśayattilākunnu
